body_html: Hi @bpiel, please use the TF_NewWhile/TF_FinishWhile functions to create while loops. The logic for while loops is quite tricky, especially when it comes to gradients, so we'd like all language bindings to use a shared implementation. We're currently working on getting while loop gradients implemented in the C API as well, stay tuned!
